sqlMap.select: SELECT a.supply_id, a.supply_type_id, b.type_name, a.item_name, a.item_unit, a.obsolete_tag, a.location, a.reorder_level, a.actual_count, a.remarks, a.date_added, a.last_user, a.last_update FROM supplies_blprr a, supply_types_blprr b WHERE a.supply_type_id = b.supply_type_id ORDER BY a.supply_id

SELECT a.supply_id, a.supply_type_id, b.type_name, a.item_name, a.item_unit, a.obsolete_tag, a.location, a.reorder_level, a.actual_count, a.remarks, a.date_added, a.last_user, a.last_update FROM supplies_blprr a, supply_types_blprr b WHERE a.supply_type_id = b.supply_type_id AND a.supply_id LIKE '%' || #searchKey# || '%' ORDER BY a.supply_id
sqlMap.procedure: BEGIN INSERT INTO supplies_blprr (supply_type_id, item_name, item_unit, obsolete_tag, location,reorder_level, actual_count, remarks, date_added, last_user, last_update) VALUES(#supplyTypeID#, #itemName#, #itemUnit#, #obsoleteTag#, #location#, #reorderLevel#, #actualCount#, #remarks#, SYSDATE, #lastUser#, SYSDATE); END;
sqlMap.insert: UPDATE supplies_blprr SET item_name = #itemName#, item_unit = #itemUnit#, obsolete_tag = #obsoleteTag#, location = #location#, reorder_level = #reorderLevel#, remarks = #remarks#, last_update = SYSDATE WHERE supply_id = #supplyID#
